unlockPuzzles.puzzle: I am the art of making, combining elements anew. What am I?
I have a head and a handle that fits, to chop and split I'm hard to beat. What am I?
I protect you from the elements, a haven from the storm. What am I?
I'm sharp and handy, cut and slice, in survival I'm worth my price.
I have a point and a rocky mission, breaking through stone is my ambition.
With seeds and soil, sun and rain, I help your food to grow again. What am I?
Deep in the earth, I'm built with care, to bring up something vital and rare. What am I?
I'm long and thin, with a hook at the end, I help you catch dinner, I'm your aquatic friend.
I'm hot inside, turning soft to hard, with me you can shape clay, I'm a crafter's card.
Threads intertwine, as I work back and forth, creating fabric fine, I prove my worth.
Fire burns hot, metal bends to will, I shape the future, with hammer and skill.
Leaves and roots, I know their use, to heal the sick, my knowledge I produce.
I stand tall and see far, guarding day and night, from my peak, everything's in sight.
Walls and roof, I keep things dry, your goods within, safe and spry.
Trees in rows, bearing sweet delight, I grow your food, from dawn to night.
Hides I treat, with skill and care, turning skin to leather, strong and fair.
Words on pages, knowledge stored, in my halls, wisdom is explored.
With wheel and hand, I shape the clay, creating vessels for use each day.
In forest deep, I track and stalk, to bring back meat, on which we'll not balk.
I dig deep into the mountain's heart, to bring forth riches, stone and ore to impart.
Shuttles fly, threads entwine, creating fabric, line by line.
Potions and tinctures, I brew with care, to cure the sick and health repair.
Goods are bought and sold with glee, in this place of commerce and trade you'll see.
Blades whir and timber falls, transforming trees to planks for walls.
Young minds gather, to learn and grow, in this place of learning, knowledge to sow.
My arms reach high, catching the breeze, grinding the grain with the greatest of ease.
Gazing at stars, secrets unfold, in this tower of science, discoveries bold.
From sand to liquid, then cooled with care, I create clear panes beyond compare.
Bubbling vats and aging casks, I create drinks for all tasks.
With hammer and anvil, I shape the ore, creating tools not seen before.
Tall and round, I stand with pride, keeping the harvest safe inside.
Spinning wheels and clattering looms, I weave fine cloth in many rooms.
Quills scratch and pages turn, preserving knowledge for all to learn.
Bubbling flasks and smoky air, I seek truths both dark and fair.
By river or sea, my creations sail free, bringing wealth from lands across the sea.
Halls of learning, minds alight, I push the boundaries of wrong and right.
Towering high for all to see, I mark achievements of our society.
Channels and pipes, I guide the flow, helping crops to thrive and grow.
Tall I stand by waters deep, guiding ships while others sleep.
Pulp and press, sheets so fine, on me your words will soon align.
Metal discs I stamp with care, creating wealth beyond compare.
Arches high, water flows, bringing life where'er it goes.
On my stage, stories unfold, entertaining young and old.
Through me gaze at stars so far, unlocking secrets of what they are.
Letters arranged in lines so neat, I make copies quick and fleet.
Melodies and harmonies resound, bringing joy to all around.
Gold and silver, notes and coins, I guard them well in secure loins.
Justice served with balanced scales, here the law never fails.
Wheels turn and belts convey, producing goods day by day.
In my wards, the sick find care, healing hands and knowledge rare.
Turbines spin with mighty force, providing power from nature's source.
On iron rails I swiftly glide, carrying goods from side to side.
Bulls and bears, they come and go, as numbers rise and fall in show.
Step by step, piece by piece, production speed I will increase.
In test tubes and under microscope, I seek answers and foster hope.
Towers high and streets so wide, a bustling hub where millions reside.
Beyond the sky, to stars we fly, in metal birds that pierce the sky.

events.name: Bountiful Harvest
events.description: An unexpectedly good harvest provides extra food.

events.name: Stone Discovery
events.description: A new stone deposit is found nearby.

events.name: Wandering Herbalist
events.description: A traveling herbalist shares some knowledge.

events.description: Heavy rain makes gathering more difficult but provides extra water.

events.name: Tool Breakthrough
events.description: Your people develop better tools, improving gathering efficiency.
